room_title: Escape room "Sherlocked" by The Clue Room in Denver
room_description:
You and your team of Scotland Yard inspectors have answered a distress call that takes you to the flat of none other than World Famous Detective Sherlock Holmes. Upon entering the flat, your team quickly realizes all is not as it seems...
You have walked right into a trap set by Holmes’ greatest nemesis, Professor James Moriarty. With 60 minutes on the clock, can you defeat Moriarty’s devious game and save England’s most beloved detective?
